question: Which method is most satisfying to deal with your enemies?

answers.text: Burning and destroying them to nothing
Torment them with the nightmare of the void
Irrelevant. The Architects' power is above all
Abilities that offer quick regeneration and ways to lock down high priority areas
Strong melee with high damage and range complimented with aoe electric abilities
Powerful grenades that offer high dps and abilites that offer both shields and higher dps

question: Which role fits you best in your team?

answers.text: Very aggressive slayer that looks to put up high kill counts and chain kills together
More passive play offering cover-fire and support for the rest of the squad
Aim for more of a hybrid style that can fit in to a number of situations and team comps
I succumb to the will of the Architects
